title: PvP.net keeps crapping out.
body: I've even gone so far as to force a re-patch on the client and I did all the port-forwarding for LoL ages ago. It's on your end Riot, please look into it.

replies.body: There are more steps you can try on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure you try everything, and let me know if anything helps.
